website_summaries.verdict: Reviewers with long, short, fine, thin, curly, and straight hair all loved this brush. Men even use it on their beards.
pros: Gentle enough for thin, fine hair
Ideal for straightening, smoothing and finishing medium to long hair
Can also use for brushouts as part of daily routine
Helps people who have started with co-washing/no-shampoo methods
Versatile enough for men, women and children of all hair types
Protective rubber cushion stops breakage and detangles medium to long hair by absorbing the “shock” of brushing
Venting allows it to  dry completely between uses, eliminating bacterial growth
Made of 100% boar bristles, which redistribute your hair’s natural oils
Bristles are durable and will last for years
cons: Wood finish chips off if left on counter
Genuine boar bristles sometimes initially have musky smell
Not recommended for use with hair extensions

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy brush
customer_reviews.text: I had read the reviews before ordering. Its a nice looking brush, I haven't had a bristle brush in probably 40 yrs, so it feels pretty good, the boar bristles are pretty stiff, a bit short, this would not be for thick hair, it works great on my very long thin hair and feels good on the scalp. I did buy the paddle brush thinking I could use this with a hair dryer, this brush does not lift the hair up to dry sadly. My intended use was for with a hair dryer, still keeping the brush for every day use, however next time I will buy the smaller oval hair brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brush. Really.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for hair extensions. Excellent, nicely made great quality brush -- surprising for the price. I was a bit concerned about the bristle material after reading negative reviews. It states 100% boar bristle on the label, and also on the brush handle. I have another boar bristle brush brought from Germany and more expensive, and the bristles on both brushes appear and feel the same. They did not melt when I was using my hair dryer. The brush does not give me any statics. I don't have a reason to suspect it is not a real boar bristle; but even if it isn't -- I don't care =)! This is the best-feeling brush ever.
customer_reviews.author: kapi

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate Odor
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this brush is great as far as size and bristle density goes. I love the width of the paddle and it really gets in and through my thick wavy hair. The only qualm I have with it is the horrendous stink I smell every time I pick it up. It's an acrid, pungent odor that no amount of washing removes. I'm really grossed out by it, especially since I noticed the smell is transferred to my hair after brushing with it! Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Granados

customer_reviews.title: Major static - I can't use this brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is sitting in my drawer not being used. I tried it 3-4 times and it caused so much static in my hair. I looked awful after using it, it's not for tangles or blow-drying, and my hair didn't feel healthier after using it. It was huge staticky mess.
customer_reviews.author: KMS

customer_reviews.title: Great for long hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair is very long, down to the small of my back. Everyone always asks how I get it to grow so long. One of my secrets is this boar bristle brush! It's very gentle on hair, much better than yanking at knots with a hard plastic brush. I only use this on dry hair. The bristles are stiff and feel good on the scalp, and boar bristles help distribute oils from the scalp to the ends of your hair to keep it healthy. I take a little time to brush my hair with this brush every day and it makes my hair soft and shiny. Over time, it has also helped my hair grow. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: RMD

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This brush is excellent! I have used Boar brushes in the past and wonder why I stopped. After a few days of using this brush I noticed that I was not seeing as many fly aways. The ends of my hair is also smoother. The only issue with this brush is that when you wash it, YOU MUST LET IT THOROUGHLY DRY OUT! If you do not your hair will smell like a pig sty. This is the most common issue people do not understand about Boar brushes. Overall, this brush is excellent and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: uruwashii

customer_reviews.title: Solid, sturdy handle but bristles too short
customer_reviews.text: Love the sturdy wooden handle. The bristles seem a bit to short. It just feels unnatural trying to brush my hair when wet. It takes me a lot of effort. I don't have overly thick hair at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice brush but I have really thick hair that gets tangled easily and the bristles don't go through the hair to do that very well. It's a nice brush, just doesn't work well for me. Also, I was hoping that it not having any plastic would cut down on the amount of static I'd have to deal with, this was not the case at all.
customer_reviews.author: S. Glozeris

customer_reviews.title: Boars Hair is the Way to Go
customer_reviews.text: Just love the feel of this brush against my scalp. I, in fact, had to purchase an additional one b/c my mother loved it as well. I would definitely recommend this product to others. Love, love, love this brush.
customer_reviews.author: RiCi

customer_reviews.title: Boar Bristle Paddle Brush...
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredibly STURDY brush. I love that it's large and just amazing. feels a bit like acrylic bristles as it makes my hair incredibly frizzy... running my hands through it after I brush brings it back down to normal though. but I have frizzy hair on a good day. it does help incredibly with getting my natural hair oils spread throughout my hair. I started using this brush because I bought NaturOli soapnut shampoo, which also helps with leaving natural hair oils in. Love this brush!!
customer_reviews.author: Annigirl22

customer_reviews.title: Quality brush!!
customer_reviews.text: A really great quality brush, it makes my hair look so smooth. The handle is very beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great brush! I have long
customer_reviews.text: Great brush! I have long, wavy, thick hair and this brush works exactly as I had hoped. I do have to divide my hair into two sections so that I can get through it all, but that's normal for me anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Sickofbeinsick

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush
customer_reviews.text: I'm growing my hair out after having it cut short for over 10 years. This brush makes my hair shiny and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfortable Hair Brush
customer_reviews.text: Items came on time and quality was as hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Mayor

customer_reviews.title: helps with frizz not detangling
customer_reviews.text: This is great for smoothing hair out and getting rid of frizz. This doesnt not work well for detangling hair.

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush
customer_reviews.text: Good design. Perfect for me, but there's no accounting for taste (or hair composition.) At first I thought it would be too big, but it is not. Good feel in the hand, good balance, and the bristles are perfect - stiff but not brusque. I leave it on the bathroom counter, and it makes a very nice decorative item, plus it's handy to use whilst galloping past the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Balzoa

customer_reviews.title: My other family members also love this brush
customer_reviews.text: The DeVille line of brushes from Spornette are the only ones that are 100% boar bristle. Spornette makes a high quality brush. I use one to brush my hair to distribute natural oil to keep my hair healthy. My other family members also love this brush.
customer_reviews.author: edelweiss

customer_reviews.title: Best brush I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This brush is amazing. The wide paddle covers a ton of surface area and the boar bristles are perfect for a smooth brush. Boar bristle help distribute the hair well, and these ones do a great job. The handle is also nice and the wood is sleek!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I love this hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairbrush. Very thick bristles, gets out all the tangles without pulling my hair and helps keep my hair shiny. Boar bristle hairbrush is the best to use for keeping your hair shiny and healthy. Use it daily. It helps to distribute the natural oils on your hair and keeps its healthy and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: mjack005

customer_reviews.title: Soft Brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a soft bristle brush and comes in nice packaging. Does what it should.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great for distributing oil. I brush with this on day 1 after a wash so that I can make it though a full 2nd day without an oil slick hair line.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: I love
customer_reviews.text: Amazing brush. I love it. Great for long thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nail Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great for longer beards.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this strictly to use on my beard which is about 6" in length and very coarse and curly. I have the smaller 2 sided brush that is very popular on here. It was great at shorter length, but I need the full width of this paddle to properly brush myself without the hair getting caught on the other side. I love the consistency of the bristles. It makes my beard nice and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: MMLeather

customer_reviews.title: Good for distributing oils, not for tangles
customer_reviews.text: I have thuck curly hair and this brush is definitely not for detangling. But it does great distributing the oils from my scalp to the ends. I make my own no poo hair shampoo and conditioner and this brush really helped my hair transition into my new lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic brush makes an incredible difference
customer_reviews.text: Great brush! Didn’t realize the boat bristles made so great a difference.
customer_reviews.author: gesch

customer_reviews.title: No more dry ends!!
customer_reviews.text: I have super thick and long hair, the ends of my hair are a little dry. My stylist recommended i get a boar bristle brush to help move the natural oil from my scalp to the ends of my hair and this brush has been able to help me do that! i love this brush
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick curly long hair
customer_reviews.text: Product information indicated the brush would work on thick, curly, long hair. It does not. It is well made and soft, but I do not recommend it. Its description information is not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Katy W

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality boar bristle brush. Be aware though, if your not used to this type of brush. It does not work for detangling! It does however, feel fantastic on your scalp! Makes your hair super shiney!
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brush!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was looking for- a brush that would spread out my hair's natural oils from root to end. The bristles are very sturdy, but comfortable and it doesn't damage or break my hairs at all. The entire brush is also very well constructed. I do have to detangle my hair first, but I don't mind and I think this brush does a great job of keep my hair looking shiny and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Park

customer_reviews.title: it is wonderful for your hair
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT...... IT HAS MADE MY HAIR HEAVENLY, SOFT, SHINY AND NO FLYAWAY FROM FRIZZ
customer_reviews.author: barbara novack

customer_reviews.title: Gentle brush
customer_reviews.text: This is good if you don't need to get out serious tangles. It's perfect for my 5 year old daughters hair as it doesn't hurt at all. It's very gentle-but it doesn't work for my older daughters thick hair. We use the Wet Brush for her
customer_reviews.author: mother of 4

customer_reviews.title: Medium stiffnesd
customer_reviews.text: Brush bristles are not stiff enough. Description does not specify but this brush is a medium firmness. Brush is quite large and handle grip difficult to hold if hands are wet.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Miller

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product for someone with thick hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush because I have always heard it is healthier to use a boar bristle hair brush because it brings the natural oils through your hair. However, I would not recommend this product for someone with thick hair, like myself. It does not feel like you are brushing your hair all the way, but rather just skimming the top layer. Despite that setback, this product is great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Soft on hair. I wish the bristles were a little longer though.
customer_reviews.author: Trilogy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: I love this Hairbrush for my hip thick long hair.
customer_reviews.author: BJC

customer_reviews.title: ... because it doesn't go straight through my thick hair like my old brush but overall I like
customer_reviews.text: I'm still trying to get used to this brush because it doesn't go straight through my thick hair like my old brush but overall I like it
customer_reviews.author: Alisah H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this my hair looks much thicker when i use this brush
customer_reviews.author: princess heather

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Not fit for purpose. The finish on the breaks down & flakes off in big pieces in just a matter of days. It looks scruffy and takie. Can't cope with any moisture. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Horse 85

customer_reviews.title: Great b
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much! I now understand why boar brushes get so much love. I wish there was a tinny comb to remove the shed hair in the brush after use. It is great
customer_reviews.author: Tetekai

customer_reviews.title: Brush does not get to scalp
customer_reviews.text: Spornette DeVille 100% Boar Bristle Paddle Brush I really wanted a boar bristle paddle brush because of the benefits, but I am disappointed with this particular brush. I have normal hair (not thick), yet the bristles do not even reach my scalp, which is the reason I bought it. In fact, I have never encountered a problem like this with a hair brush, so it was not something I even considered. Maybe the brush has too many bristles. I cannot even imagine how this brush would work on someone with thick hair. I guess I will have to buy a more expensive brush.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great Boar Brush
customer_reviews.text: Couple things about this brush. First of all, love this brush! And second, this brush is NOT for detangling. Boar bristle brushes are not made for that purpose. Your only supposed to use it after your hair is dry and detangled. Also, the size of this brush is probably better suited for people with longer hair.
customer_reviews.author: Raudel

customer_reviews.title: Very large, very durable, best for long hair
customer_reviews.text: if you are a guy with short hair, this brush is probably too big for you. I wanted one by this company I wish I would have got a smaller size. But it is constructed well and no bristles have fallen out.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Not combination bristles
customer_reviews.text: I could have sworn the description shown on Amazon said this brush was combination nylon and boar bristle. Its not. Maybe I misread. The brush wouldn't even go through my hair it was so wimpy, and I have fine hair. Threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: it's real
customer_reviews.text: I plucked a bristle and burned it, it curled and smelled like hair, the product is real, and works really well for distributing the natural oils from your scalp. It's a fine brush for the price. Also, it's not too large it's just a normal paddle brush size.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: This brush was not made for thick hair. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This brush was not made for thick hair. I can barely get to my scalp and it flattens my hair and causes static electricity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful paddle brush!!!,
customer_reviews.text: This brush is amazing!!!! I've had it for a while and it still works well and is in great condition!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Young

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush. The construction and materials are both excellent. It'd be way more expensive if purchased via conventional retail.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyles

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Not great for thick hair.
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel I get a good brush thru with this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rice

customer_reviews.title: I love this brush
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush to help blend my real hair into my clip in hair extensions when I wear them straight. It does an amazing job. The brush is a good quality. I would and have recommended this brush to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Does not detangle
customer_reviews.text: It makes your hair super soft but does not detangle at all.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie89

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good brush for a while and I think I found the perfect one! I don't use shampoo any more and this brush moves the oils down my hair shaft better than any of my plastic brushes did. And it is super easy to clean. The only draw back is the that the bristles are not really long and aren't good at actually styling hair. I still keep my plastic brush around to comb out my hair. But I use my boar bristle brush every night to brush my hair and make it super soft. GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush to help me with my transitioning hair after giving up shampoo. Honestly, I can't tell a difference between when I use it and when I don't. However, it is incredibly soft and feels lovely against your scalp. I have long, thick, straight, Caucasian hair. This brush might be more useful for those with very fine or even curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not good for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: Nice brush but it can't get through my thick hair. I tried brushing it multiple ways and in the end, there are still tangles I have to get out with another brush. Luckily, the price was low so I'm not out much money but it's relatively useless. Additionally, it causes so much static. I have tried using hair spray and rubbing a dryer sheet on it but relief is only temporary. Wouldn't recommend if your hair is thick at all.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush to increase natural shine in my somewhat thick wavy hair. For some reason this brush does not even "brush" my hair. It cannot even reach the roots of my hair...it cannot grasp or hold my hair. Would have returned
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Messer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't really what I was expecting in a brush. ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't really what I was expecting in a brush. Makes my hair very static-y and does not brush out knots.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Robbin

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best brush ever.. my guy has thick naturally Curley hair and boar bristle brushes are perfect for his mane.
customer_reviews.author: T.A.LaMoureaux

customer_reviews.title: The amazing boar bristle paddle brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is sooo sweet! I love it so much! It's so smooth when it brushes my hair. I get a better groom with this brush. Thanks again!!
customer_reviews.author: javier

customer_reviews.title: Great hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: This is what I have been looking for! My hair is glossy and looks so much better. I brush now every night just like in the old days. Wonderful brush -- love it!
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: She loves the brush
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter likes the brush very much. I doesn't hurt when her mom brushes her hair. My grand daughter is 3.
customer_reviews.author: R K

customer_reviews.title: great brush
customer_reviews.text: Great hair brush and works well with blow drying too
customer_reviews.author: gemma mathews

customer_reviews.title: I don't really like how thick the bristles are
customer_reviews.text: This brushes the top of my hair but not underneath. It is very thick bristle and it is 100% boar, but I liked the other spornette I bought better.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Christina II

customer_reviews.title: I love this brush
customer_reviews.text: Great brush for flat brushing the hair when drying very thick/coarse hair. The hair is so shiny and soft when using this brush as a drying aid.
customer_reviews.author: Deannah

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made.. Heavy bristled brush! Great for short hair! Definitely not a plastic brush! Would be great for that guy in your life!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri L Thompson

customer_reviews.title: love love love this brush
customer_reviews.text: love love love this brush. Its amazing. Makes my hair so shiny and soft. I do hair and love bore brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Tahneegraham

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous brush. I will be using it for dry ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous brush. I will be using it for dry brushing. The boar bristles have just the right texture I was looking for to accomplish this and the size makes it easier to hold and use.
customer_reviews.author: Star Lore

customer_reviews.title: This is my new favorite brush. IT works great on my hair
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite brush. IT works great on my hair. My hair is fine, but curly. So this works great to leave long locks of curls.
customer_reviews.author: lilmouse 1973

customer_reviews.title: Quality brush
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, sturdy bristles, and easy to handle. Checked many brushes and felt this was more expensive but worth the money. Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: klingler

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with its price as well delivery
customer_reviews.text: The hair brush helps me to style my hairs. I am very happy with its price as well delivery time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nightly use
customer_reviews.text: This goes through my hair easily. I do not use this type of brush on wet hair.
customer_reviews.author: S. S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. It is a really good quality brush and feels great on the scalp too.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Hey spornette, you DO know false advertising can get you in a lot of trouble, right?
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure this is not 100% boar bristle and they're false advertising which is ILLEGAL. Some of the bristles aren't like the others, and there does seem to be actual boar bristle in here, but the brush I used to have that was genuine worked a lot better and got through my thick hair. This barely gets through my hair and the bristles that are plastic cause my hair to get static frizz. Overall pretty disappointed. I would not order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: was hopeful
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it would have more scalp and hair penetration, but it doesn't seem to work well with my thick wavy hair sadly
customer_reviews.author: Laura Packer

customer_reviews.title: great brush
customer_reviews.text: my husband has been looking for this type brush for a long time great buy love it, would buy again
customer_reviews.author: bonnie cooper

customer_reviews.title: Don't use with a blowdryer!
customer_reviews.text: The second day I had this brush, I used it to blow dry my hair and half of the brush tips were burned! Now I am left with a brush that breaks my hair due to the burned bristles.
customer_reviews.author: JBCSM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great brush, i have thick long curly hair and tames my my wild mess
customer_reviews.author: Devin Garrity Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A++ Product, Will Only Buy and Use This Specific One
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush, it makes my hair softer, distributes my natural hair olis throughout my hair, feels great on my head when I brush, Overall Wonderful, no problems
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush
customer_reviews.text: Other than making my hair a bit staticy, I think it is a nice brush. It really redistributes the oils from the scalp to make hair smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality brush
customer_reviews.text: I bought two styles of paddle brushes for my husband and he likes them both. Priced very reasonably and the bristles are of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Gould

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: This brush is pretty nice, except I have thick hair, and the bristles don't reach my scalp the way I would like.
customer_reviews.author: kwadd

customer_reviews.title: nice bristles
customer_reviews.text: this brush is nice, not too harsh on hair, good quality and nice size. Quality wood and easy on the hand.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: This brush is great! I have had it for about 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This brush is great! I have had it for about 6 months. My daughter no longer cries tmwhen it time to brush her hair. She actually asks me to brush her hair. A great brush for parents and kids alike.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Underkoffler

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My hair feels so soft and doesn't tangle as much as it did before. I also have been able to go longer between shampooing!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: A great BIG brush
customer_reviews.text: A great brush, just bigger than I expected.....check your dimensions! My own fault, but that's why it's a 4 and not a 5
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Brush melts from dryer heat
customer_reviews.text: This is not 100% genuine boar bristle. The bristles melted the first time I used it with my hair dryer. I would not recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Frye

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for two years and it's held up well. It replaced a very old bristle brush that was worn out. As mentioned, it's large and somewhat heavy, but works well for my fairly short hair.
customer_reviews.author: M.A. Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my hair standing tall.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is bigger than what you imagine when you look at the picture, so read the specs before you order it. That being said, I am very satisfied with this purchase. I did not have bristles fall out, as some have complained. I wear a very short flat top, and this keeps my hair up straight in front.
customer_reviews.author: John B. Case

customer_reviews.title: fine brush
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent hairbrush, very solid and feels great. i expect it will provide many years of excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: chris shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not pure wood or boar bristle, but still works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: The wood on this is fake and flakes off, and it is not pure boar bristle, just half and half I would guess, but that actually turned out okay because just boar doesn't go through my thick hair. I did like the shine this gave to my hair, but the wood would occasionally flake into it. It's up to you whether you want this, it's only about $10 and works well, but the handle is not pure wood.
customer_reviews.author: RayK877

customer_reviews.title: Got thick hair?
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it your hairs thick. My salon uses boar's hair brushes. I thought I'd give it a try. What a disappointment! My hairs thick, I have a lot of hair. This type of brush is great for smoothing hair, but this brush doesn't even brush thru my hair. Can't use it. Too bad, waste of money ."
customer_reviews.author: babsy

customer_reviews.title: boar brush
customer_reviews.text: it feels good as i brush though my hair and keeping my waves tight. it also looks good and appears as though it is sturdy just by the quality of the manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight1

customer_reviews.title: superb brush
customer_reviews.text: My husband after YEARS of having his favorite brush had to get a new one. This is bigger and better than his last one. He really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E. Kirby

customer_reviews.title: A bit too soft
customer_reviews.text: A bit too soft for my liking. Need to brush first with the Olivia mix bristle and boar brush.
customer_reviews.author: CATHY

customer_reviews.title: Spornette DeVille Paddle Brush
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these brushes for myself and daughters. We all use the brushes without any issues. Good for long hair. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Helen T

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: This brush feels great on my hair. It doesn't pull and gives me a shiny finish...love it. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Delia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Really good brush. I have long hair so i wanted to have a wide brush to gently tame my hair frizzies. The wooden handle is great, hand the brush does perfectly the job!
customer_reviews.author: Céline

customer_reviews.title: very good quality product
customer_reviews.text: The hairbrush is a very good quality product, brush perfectly my hair without damaging it. I would recommend this product to everybody with long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Perreaux

customer_reviews.title: Hair brush
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, a perfect birthday gift. It replaced a very old brush that was many years old.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: brush
customer_reviews.text: It works as it should and it easy to clean. Fits nicely in my hand. Good for gently scratching an itchy scalp.
customer_reviews.author: kaimono

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: I wish I didn't by this. It's too soft and makes my hair FULL of static. My 3 year old loves it because it's gentle but she has static too
customer_reviews.author: Jcjc

customer_reviews.title: dont really care for it
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a good brush for the price I paid for it, but I dont really like it. It really doesnt brush my hair and I dont even have thick hair. If you buy this brush you must have really thin hair because if you have natural to thick hair it wont brush it, its too soft.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

product_meta.title: Spornette DeVille Cushion Paddle Boar Bristle Hair Brush (#344) with Wooden Handle Best for Straightening, Smoothing, Detangling & Styling All Hair Types for Women, Men, and Children
feature_bullets: PADDLE-SHAPED: The Spornette Deville Paddle brush is the ideal hairbrush for straightening hair. Because of its wide, flat surface, this paddle brush is best for straightening, smoothing and finishing medium to long hair. You can also use it for brush outs as part of your daily hair and styling routine.

DO-IT-ALL FOR ALL HAIR TYPES: This brush is the perfect choice for men, women and children with straight, curly or wavy, thick to fine hair. A great choice for natural and treated, ethnic, coarse and African hair, this paddle brush is also safe for extensions, wigs and even a weave

PROTECTIVE RUBBER CUSHION: The cushion stops breakage and detangles medium to long hair by absorbing the “shock” of brushing. It’s also vented with an air hole that allows air to circulate under the rubber. This allows it to dry out completely between uses, eliminating bacterial growth and keeping it clean, healthy and safe.

100% BOAR BRISTLES: The Deville Cushion Paddle Brush boasts 100% boar bristles that redistribute your hair’s natural oils, leaving it shinier, healthier-looking and more manageable… and with no greasy buildup! The dense high quality boar bristles are very durable and will last for years of repeated use. This is a professional tool that gives professional results.

ELEGANT WOODEN HANDLE: Not only is the wooden handle of this boar bristle brush elegant, it’s sturdy and built to last. And because it’s lightweight and ergonomically shaped, your hands won’t cramp or tire while styling.
